title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing OK after setting the output location and classpath in project properties, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are treated as separate operations. As a result, setting the output location first creates an illegal state.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location. 
2. Go to project properties. 
3. Change the settings to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location.
